title: Pathian angchhung thianghlimah chuan
lyrics:
Pathian angchhung thianghlimah chuan,
Thihna fate an chawl ang;
Mak an la ti hle ang tah chuan,
Hremhmun meia an chhuahna.
Pathian fakna,
Vanah a tawp tawh lo vang.

Sual laka a tlan vang khanin,
Chhandamtu Lalpa Isua;
Chatuan hmun nuam an thlen hunin,
Zaiin an fak fo vang a.
Tingtang tumte,
Vanah a tawp tawh lo vang.

Mihring thinlunga lut ngai lo,
Mit hmuh loh, benga hriat ngai loh,
Lalpan a hmangaihtute tan
A buatsaih kha an chang ang.
An nunkhaw nawm,
Kumkhuain a zual zel ang.

Pathian hmaah puan var sinin,
Chhun zan zawmin an awm ang;
Riltam, tuihal tuar tawh lovin,
Nuam zawng zawng an nei reng ang.
Hrehawm reng reng,
Chatuanin an tuar lo vang.

Jerusalem thar nuamah chuan,
Thih leh nat, lusun, thlaphan;
Mangan leh hah hre tawh lo chuan,
An ning lo'ng ennawm thlir fan.
Lalpa hmangaih,
Bang lovin an fak fo vang.
